title: 15 Editor-Approved Winter Dresses You Need This Season
description: Because not every day is meant for a pair of wool pants.
excerpt: We found the best winter dresses for this holiday season. Shop the best styles in our edit now.

html:
Cool Blue

Ganni Poplin Big Collar Mini Shirt Dress

Ganni truly understood the assignment with this dress; rest assured, I’ve added it to the top of my holiday wish list). Fingers crossed!

Sizes: 0-10

Colors: Sky Captain

Materials: Lightweight non-stretch poplin

Plaid Princess

Free People Nightingale Plaid Midi Dress

Not only would this plaid dress pair well in your wardrobe for the holidays, but it would also look stunning in the spring. I love versatility.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Indigo Combo, Green Combo, Red Combo

Materials: Cotton

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Babydoll Energy

Endless Rose Ruffle Tiered Velvet Mini Dress

If you are anything like me, then you love to dress up for any occasion. This sweet velvet ruffled dress is sure to make just the statement you’ve been looking for. Style it with your favorite kitten heel and pieces of jewelry.

Sizes: XS-L

Colors: Black

Materials: Polyester, elastane

Sporty Chic

Ser.o.ya Saydi Sweater Dress

We all need an upscale sporty number in our holiday roundup, and I think this one takes the cake. The quarter zip and cropped detail are stunning and will look great whether you style it with Uggs or a platform boot.

Sizes: XXS-XL

Colors: Eggshell

Materials: Acrylic, polybutylene, nylon

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bow-Tastic

Bernadette Bow Strapless Babydoll Mini Dress

If you’re headed to a holiday party and can’t find anything to wear, try a coquettish babydoll dress. The bow embellishment adds a sweet touch of femininity, and the bright pop of color is sure to earn you some sweet compliments.

Sizes: 4-12

Colors: Red

Materials: Polyester

Ballerina Core

Helmut Lang Protection Draped Midi-Dress

I love an asymmetrical dress, and this Helmut Lang piece is exactly what I’ve been looking for. The additional fabric creates a beautiful layered look and serves balletcore in an unconventional way. In my opinion, this makes the dress just that much more appealing.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Dusty Pink, Olive, Black

Materials: Lyocell, elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Viral One

Skims Soft Lounge Long Sleeve Dress

We’ve all seen the viral TikTok videos of this dress, not to mention how it’s been styled by celebs like Kim Cattrall, Nicola Coughlan, and, of course, Kim Kardashian herself. The thick “snatching” material is incredible. Maybe you’ve thought about it. Here’s your excuse to try it out for yourself.

Sizes: XXS-4X

Colors: Heather Grey, Onyx

Materials: Modal, elastane

Red Is The New Pink

Staud Cindy Long Sleeve Stretch Cotton Shirtdress

Staud has outdone itself with this burgundy number. The oversized sleeves and button-down effect make the dress incredibly trendy while remaining elevated. Dress it up with heels or keep it casual with a riding boot.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Merlot

Materials: Cotton, spandex

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

It-Girl Status

Cecilie Bahnsen Green Olivia Minidress

I have no words for how beautiful this dress is. My only advice is to grab it before it’s gone.

Sizes: XS-2XL

Colors: Grey Olive

Materials: 100% recycled polyamide

Ooh La La

Khaite Ava Dress

I am a huge fan of the off-the-shoulder moment, and Khaite has stolen the show with this chic wool option. The sleek silhouette offers an effortlessly elegant feel.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Grapeseed, Black

Materials: Wool, polyamide

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sweater Season

English Factory V Neck Knit Dress

We all want to feel cozy and cute during the holidays, and this sweater dress has absolutely nailed that combo. It’s perfect for dinners or a visit home to show off your styling skills.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Cream

Materials: Stretch knit

Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo

Line & Dot Gramercy Maxi Dress

Looking to win best dressed? Look no further; the open-back detail and baby blue color is the perfect way to stand out this winter.

Sizes: XS-L

Colors: Steel Blue

Materials: Polyester, spandex

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

LBD

Reformation Vivien Knit Dress

You can never go wrong with a little black dress, and this one offers a subtly sexy yet chic look. Pair it with your favorite dressy boots and a mini bag, and you’re ready for date night or a night out dancing with the girls.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Black, Spice, Tone

Materials: Polyester, spandex

The Casual One

Mango Asymmetrical Dress with Slit

Mango has been on our radar for go-to holiday looks this year; need I say more?

Sizes: 0-12

Colors: Medium Brown

Materials: Cotton, elastane

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Day-To-Night

Reiss Catlyn Jersey Drape Asymmetric Midi Dress

A dress that works well at the office in addition to an evening out is a win in my book.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Grey

Materials: Viscose, elastane

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
